name: Egress Group
tagline: Unlocking the value of your investment
description:
Egress Group is a next generation IT Service company. From our inception in 2006 we have consistently delivered innovative solutions to both technical and business challenges. Our objective is simple; to unlock the value of the investment our clients make in information technology.
We understand that by having a clear focus on delivering benefit as an outcome, we add significant value; enabling our clients to achieve sustainable performance improvements and deliver a far greater return on their investment. We are a learning organisation, taking our experience from each project and developing repeatable solutions to drive efficiency and value.
